name: Fan Rotom
author: Toshinao Aoki
flavor_text: There are several appliances that Rotom can inspirit, but the first one to be developed was the electric fan.

abilities.name: Fan Call
abilities.effect: Once during your first turn, you may search your deck for up to 3 {C} Pokémon with 100 HP or less, reveal them, and put them into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck. You can’t use more than 1 Fan Call Ability during your turn.

attacks.name: Assault Landing
attacks.effect: If there is no Stadium in play, this attack does nothing.
